ai-patthana22.20:0.2_0: under the influence of the Dhamma: the Protector of the Three Worlds
ai-patthana22.20:0.3_0: Only (only) the Careful Tree is the cause,
ai-patthana22.20:1.1_0: (They are) not defiled; and lacking thought does not give rise to the defiled; and causes and conditions for the sake of defilement.
ai-patthana22.20:1.1_1: This is the section in brief.
